content.title: Here is what you need to know
content.description:
Membership at Encounter City is more than just a title; it is a commitment to grow, serve, and belong. As a member, you will have the opportunity to deepen your faith, connect with a supportive community, and actively participate in the life and mission of our church.

Here are the steps you need to take to become one of us.
